name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Detroit Utica

reviews.text: We were visiting my Aunt and this hotel was a great bargain nearby. The room was clean with a fridge and microwave. There is a wide variety of restaurants and shopping nearby. Dealing with the turn arounds on I-59 and traffic was interesting. The only problem we really had was the fact we were on the 2nd floor and the people on the floor above us sounded like a herd of elephants. The running, jumping, and slamming of doors got so bad that by 2 a.m. I had enough and called the front desk. I was told by management that they would call our neighbors and the noise did subside but never did completely.
reviews.title: Good location but noisy neighbors

reviews.text: We booked this hotel with friends and family members for a shopping weekend.We were not disappointed.There was an abundance of shopping and restaurants nearby to choose from.We found our rooms recently renovated .clean and overall above avereage.We had no complaints whatsoeverThe hotel lobby area is not fancy,but it was clean and nice..We paid $51 per night including a continental breakfast and a king bed during a promo which may no longer be offered.We are going back to this area again soon and will definately be staying here!
reviews.title: Great Place

reviews.text: We booked this hotel last minute and were so glad we did. The service was beyond excellent and we loved all the extras the hotel provided (like microwave and fridge.) Our room was right next to the pool, and both the pool and jacuzzi were large and clean. The stay was topped off with a lovely free breakfast in the morning.
reviews.title: Jacuzzi of Gold!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked 3 rooms for my family to attend an afternoon wedding. Staff let us into one of the rooms 3 hours before check-in so we could change for the occasion. The room had many perks including frig, microwave, coffee pot, iron & board, and digital thermostat to keep the room comfy. The pool and hot tub were very relaxing and warm. We enjoyed our stay and would stay here again if ever in the area.
reviews.title: This one's a winner

reviews.text: The location of this hotel is great. It is just off M-59 (Hall Rd) in Utica. There are lots of restaurant choices within a 5 minute drive of the hotel. The hotel staff was very friendly and prompyly checked me in upon arrival. The rooms were clean and included a microwave and fridge. Very reasonablly priced hotel for the area.
reviews.title: Good Location, Nice Accomodations

reviews.text: I stayed here on business for one night in August 2011.
reviews.title: Fine if internet access not a priority

reviews.text: PROS: clean room, comfortable bed with multiple pillows, good shower, microwave, fridge, nice LCD television, and a desk with accessible electric plugs.
reviews.title: Quite adequate for what we needed!

reviews.text: CONS: Terrible internet access. I could not even stay logged on long enough to check email. When I questioned the front desk about it, I was told that when “too many guests stream movies” that other guests get knocked off. If their bandwidth is not sufficient for the number of rooms – and they know about it – then it’s time to upgrade their system. No accessible plugs near nightstand (a pet peeve of mine). Pool and hot tub was closed for renovations.
reviews.title: Clean and Spacious rooms, but it's a two star at best.

reviews.text: Bottom line, I don’t recommend staying here if you really need internet access until they upgrade their current system.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: We arrived in Clinton Twp too late to pick up from our supplier and had to stay overnight unexpectedly. We stayed at this hotel and found it was very clean and check in was just fine. There are a few restaurants within walking distance and the hotel was close to where we needed to be early the next morning. The breakfast was just ok for us as we had to grab a muffin and coffee and go. 94 US dollars was reasonable for the night and we would stay here again if needed.
reviews.title: The minute I walked in, I should have walked out!

aka: La Quinta Inn And Suites Detroit/Utica
